title: RHOBH: Blaming the Altitude +RHOP Trailer!
itunes:title: RHOBH: Blaming the Altitude +RHOP Trailer!
description:
Danny recaps this week's episode of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, which featured the continuation of the Aspen trip. We saw the women snow mobiling, skiing, and blaming their behavior on the altitude. Some of the women also confront Erika about the infamous earrings, while Kath and Kyle begin to crack.


After RHOBH, Danny talks about the RHOP trailer and what's to come on Potomac!


RHOP Trailer Recap: 41:46ish


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino
